title: Out-of-this-world spacesuits: Quantifying uncertainty helps keep heroes safe
content:
Abstract
NASA and the US Department of Defense acquire some of the worldâ€™s most complex systems. Assessing their effectiveness and reliability requires rigorous statistical planning, including uncertainty quantification (UQ). Here, John W. Dennis, John T. Haman, and James E. Warner walk us through the testing of a new spacesuit system
